description: ESTABLISHING AND IMPLEMENTING A NATIONAL ACTION PROGRAMME TO COMBAT DESERTIFICATION IN LEBANON

subproject.description: A financing strategy for the implementation of the National Action Programme (NAP) to combat Desertification was developed; it includes innovative mechanisms and new donors, while mainstreaming UNCCD considerations into existing strategies.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: UNCCD Financing Strategy

subproject.description:
The project aims at identifying and strengthening trade opportunities for dry-land products, including ecotourism, through increased marketing, identifying existing prospects with EU trade agreements with Lebanon, supporting Fair-trade (FT) certification while strengthening national capacity to access international markets throughout the project.
The project targets women empowerment and poverty alleviation in rural dry lands through promotion of trade with Finnish and European markets and through creation of other income-generating livelihoods such as responsible tourism.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Enhancing Market Access

title: Rural Dryland Development through UNCCD implementation
